Posted By: Aun (4/22/2010 6:18:01 PM)
Rating:

@Orichalkos:
Allies' abilities are triggered abilities because they trigger when an event happens (an ally hits the battlefield). The allies that require you to tap to activate the ability, such as Harabaz Druid and Sea Gate Loremaster.

Great card, though undercosted. 5 mana would be more appropriate I'd think. Run with Tajuru Preserver in standard if you want a good way of shutting down most of your opponents.

posts.post_content:
This card stops so many things, although it needs to stay protected somehow. There's a long, long list of various abilties it stops from sphinx of magosi card draw, to eldrazi spawn sac., to mana abilities, to even drana or kalitas creature kill ability.
  
   
Funny how they convieniently print a card that basically undoes at least half of what the set tries to do.
  
   
Oh and fyi, it stops invokers, including the dawnglare invoker.
